Tech to Empower

Technology Creates Opportunity

Donate Today

About Us

Tech to Empower is a non-profit organization founded by three seniors from Flower Mound High School. We collect donations of old technology, and use monetary donations to purchase used chromebooks. We then distribute these donations to local causes that benefit from tech donations.

Donate

Click the images below for more info on donating
Monetary Donation
Paypal, Debit, Credit, Cash, and Check
Tech Donation
Laptops, Tablets, Phones, and prepaid internet devices

How We Use Donations

When we receive tech donations, we check that they are in full working condition and properly reset to ensure that the donor's information is no longer on the device. If we receive a tech donation that is not in adequate condition, we may either repair/refurbish it, or if the cost to do so is considerable, then we will work with e-waste partners to ensure that the device is properly recycled.

Monetary donations are used to purchase used chromebooks in bulk. One $70 donation provides a functional chromebook for a person who lacks access to basic technology. Monetary donations are also used to fund repairs and refurbish tech donations that we have received. Tech donations that were already in good condition, refurbished tech donations, and purchased chromebooks are then given to people who would benefit from access to technology. We work with distribution partners such as soup kitchens, childrens homes, and homeless shelters to ensure that technology reaches the people who need it the most.

Monetary Donation

Paypal, Debit, Credit, Cash, and Check

We accept monetary donations through PayPal, debit card, or credit card. If you would like to donate through cash or check, contact us.

Donate Today

Technology Donations

Laptops, Tablets, Phones, and prepaid internet devices

If you have an old laptop, tablet, or phone in usable condition and are not sure what to do with it, consider donating it to Tech to Empower. For technology donations, we can either come to you to collect your donation or meet halfway, depending on your location.
